H0.text: A computer model is the tool that will best help scientists understand relationships between oceans and climate changes.

H1.text: A weather balloon is the tool that will best help scientists understand relationships between oceans and climate changes.

H2.text: A rain gauge will best help scientists understand relationships between oceans and climate changes.

H3.text: Radar is the tool that best helps scientists understand the relationships between oceans and climate changes.

A4.text: Atmospheric models coupled with oceanic models simulate climate variability by calculating heat transfer, radiation, and ocean currents.

A5.text: Earth System Models include land use and land use changes, allowing prediction of climate-ecosystem interactions.
